yes so I'm Alan St I'm the director of
customer contacts for Virgin medoro 2
virgin medo 2 is a UK based
telecommunications company with around 6
million fixed line customers and 40
million mobile connections we have 44
locations globally with just over 10 a
half thousand
agents so our vision was one of
convergence we'd converge the brands
virgin media and O2 had come together we
wanted to converge the service
experience to enable a continuous
conversation regardless of where the

touch point that the customer came
to what AWS provided for us was
Simplicity Simplicity of integration
Simplicity of our very complicated
technical stacks and simplicity to allow
through data and insight a continuous
conversation what we're seeing in the
migrations that we've already done is
improved customer satisfaction we're
seeing reduced handoffs which was one of
our key ambition we're seeing greater

we're providing for them we're seeing
greater better customer outcomes a
result of that simplified operating
model and greater insight to the

understood our customer issues
understood our business challenges and
worked with us to collectively solve for
those
challenges so the key learnings for us
in integrating Amazon connect was around
understanding that an organization we
had to be a partnership so exenta were
obviously very established with Amazon
with AWS and the connect product they
